BYE, MARK, UNMARK, LIST, TODO, DEADLINE, EVENT, DELETE, DATE, FIND

* Command class responsible for adding tasks to the task list.

* @param tasks   The TaskList to which the task will be added.
* @param ui      The Ui to display user messages.
* @param storage The Storage to save the updated task list.
* @throws ZackException If there is an error adding the task.
* @throws IOException   If there is an error in saving the task list.

* Represents a command to exit the application.
* Executes the command to display a goodbye message and exit the application.
* @param tasks   The TaskList containing all tasks.
* @param ui      The UI for displaying messages to the user.
* @param storage The Storage for saving and loading tasks.
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Represents an abstract command that can be executed.
* Constructs a Command object with the initial state of not being an exit command.
* Executes the command with the given TaskList, Ui, and Storage objects.
* @param tasks   The TaskList containing all tasks.
* @param ui      The UI for displaying messages to the user.
* @param storage The Storage for saving and loading tasks.
* @throws ZackException If there is an error while executing the command.
* @throws IOException  If there is an error with input/output operations.
public abstract void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws ZackException, IOException;
* Checks if the command is an exit command.
* @return True if the command is an exit command, false otherwise.

* Command class responsible for marking a task as done or undone.
* Constructs a MarkCommand with the specified task index and the desired status (done or undone).
* @param index  The index of the task to be marked.
* @param isDone True if the task should be marked as done, false if it should be marked as undone.
* Executes the MarkCommand, marking the task at the specified index as done or undone.
* @param tasks   The TaskList containing all tasks.
* @param ui      The Ui to display user messages.
* @param storage The Storage to save the updated task list.
* @throws ZackException If there is an error marking the task.
* @throws IOException   If there is an error in saving the task list.
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws ZackException, IOException {
throw new ZackException("Task index is out of range. Please enter a number between 1 and " + tasks.getSize() + ".");
* Represents a task with a deadline.

* @param by          The deadline of the task in "yyyy-MM-dd HHmm" format.
* @param isDone      True if the task is marked as done, false otherwise.
* @throws ZackException If there is an error in parsing the deadline or if the format is invalid.
public Deadline(String description, String by, boolean isDone) throws ZackException {
throw new ZackException("Invalid date and time format. Please enter in yyyy-MM-dd HHmm format.");

* Represents a task with a specific event duration.

* @param from        The start time of the event in "yyyy-MM-dd HHmm" format.

* @throws ZackException If there is an error in parsing the event times or if the format is invalid.

* Shows a message when a task is added, along with the current number of tasks.
